TopicTitle: Space Center UIs vanishing or not working properly

Articles.Content:
2.2Ghz Core 2 Duo, 2GB ram, OS 10.6.8

KSP 1.0.2

These problems did not start till after I tried installing a couple mods, Kerbal Engineer and Mech Jeb, and a couple docking alignment assists. But I deleted all of those and re-installed KSP before the problems really started. I had a bug where a rocket wouldn't start burning on the launchpad, it just sat there even though staging said the engines were on. After that I deleted all mods. 

The first thing that happened was the construction center got bugged up. When accessed all the availible parts were just mashed together, no sub menus. This was persistant across all save games. Any part clicked would pop into the center, but couldn't be selected or moved. I re-installed a couple times, but preserved my save games, and this issue went away. Immediately afterwards however, I found myself suddenly unable to use the research tree. It just vanished. see figure A: 

![s84PgOu.png](http://i.imgur.com/s84PgOu.png)

Frustated, I started a new game, figuring I could catch up and tired of fighting with it. For a couple missions all was well, then the availible contracts vanished, figure B. 

![TmTKrqo.png](http://i.imgur.com/TmTKrqo.png)

When I first click the tab everything looks normal for just a fraction of a second, then disappears. 

I've checked, and these problems are attached to the save games somehow. On the first game, the contracts work fine, but the research tree is gone. On the second game I can research to my heart's content, but the contracts poof away. No amount of restarting or re-installing has helped. 

Would like to resolve these issues so I can go on playing. Right now the game is broken for me.

Update. I re-installed KSP after deleting all associated files I could find, as near as I can tell a completely fresh start. The problem with the contracts is persistant. A new game still will not show me any contracts after the default 4 are accepted and completed.
Please see the [thread=92230]Stock Support and Bug Reporting Guide[/thread]. We'll need more information to help.

[http://s000.tinyupload.com/?file_id=07889140847178147458](http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=07889140847178147458)

Log file for a brand new install, creating new career, flying one mission to complete the first two contracts, visiting mission control to see that no new contracts appeared, and quitting. 

[http://s000.tinyupload.com/?file_id=07212436655153375600](http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=07212436655153375600)

Here is the save created in that experiment. Note that after the first flight, what I see when entering mission control is a glitch where for a fraction of a second I can see a whole bunch of contracts in the leftmost box, then they vanish, leaving only whatever contracts are unfinished of the first four. This glitch happens every time I load mission control, on every save. 

This problem has proved to be persistant across all saves and any re-installs or fiddling I've come up with. Even my oldest save game, where I can see contracts, is broken. No new contracts replace those if they are completed or time out. Some help with this problem would be really appreciated. I can play science or sandbox all I want, but career mode is completely broken for me, which is very frustrating.
